```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tibble)
```

## Introduction 
This vignette lists the country names in the supplied data that local and/or spatial modelling is possible for.

## Country names

knitr::kable((data1), booktabs = TRUE,
